Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.AsyncInputStream
    replaced by the more idiomatic Publisher<ByteBuffer> instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.AsyncOutputStream
    replaced by the more idiomatic Publisher<ByteBuffer> instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSDownloadStream
    use GridFSDownloadPublisher instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSUploadStream
    use GridFSUploadPublisher instead
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.helpers.AsyncStreamHelper
    there is no replacement for this class
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoCollection.count()
    use MongoCollection.countDocuments() or MongoCollection.estimatedDocumentCount() instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoCollection.count(Bson)
    Use MongoCollection.countDocuments(Bson) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoCollection.count(Bson, CountOptions)
    Use MongoCollection.countDocuments(Bson, CountOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoCollection.count(ClientSession)
    Use MongoCollection.countDocuments(ClientSession) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoCollection.count(ClientSession, Bson)
    Use MongoCollection.countDocuments(ClientSession, Bson) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoCollection.count(ClientSession, Bson, CountOptions)
    Use MongoCollection.countDocuments(ClientSession, Bson, CountOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoClients.create(MongoClient)
    Deprecated because MongoClient is deprecated.
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoClients.create(MongoClientSettings)
    use MongoClients.create(com.mongodb.MongoClientSettings) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoClients.create(MongoClientSettings, MongoDriverInformation)
    use MongoClients.create(com.mongodb.MongoClientSettings) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.downloadToStream(BsonValue, AsyncOutputStream)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(BsonValue) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.downloadToStream(ClientSession, BsonValue, AsyncOutputStream)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(ClientSession, BsonValue) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.downloadToStream(ClientSession, ObjectId, AsyncOutputStream)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(ClientSession, ObjectId) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.downloadToStream(ClientSession, String, AsyncOutputStream)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(ClientSession, String) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.downloadToStream(ClientSession, String, AsyncOutputStream, GridFSDownloadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(ClientSession, String, GridFSDownloadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.downloadToStream(ObjectId, AsyncOutputStream)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(ObjectId) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.downloadToStream(String, AsyncOutputStream)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(String) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.downloadToStream(String, AsyncOutputStream, GridFSDownloadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(String, GridFSDownloadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoClient.getSettings()
    this method is being removed
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.FindPublisher.maxScan(long)
    Deprecated as of MongoDB 4.0 release
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.FindPublisher.modifiers(Bson)
    use the individual setters instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openDownloadStream(BsonValue)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(BsonValue) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openDownloadStream(ClientSession, BsonValue)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(ClientSession, BsonValue) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openDownloadStream(ClientSession, ObjectId)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(ClientSession, ObjectId) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openDownloadStream(ClientSession, String)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(ClientSession, String) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openDownloadStream(ClientSession, String, GridFSDownloadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(ClientSession, String, GridFSDownloadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openDownloadStream(ObjectId)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(ObjectId) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openDownloadStream(String)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(String) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openDownloadStream(String, GridFSDownloadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.downloadToPublisher(String, GridFSDownloadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openUploadStream(BsonValue, String)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(BsonValue, String, Publisher) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openUploadStream(BsonValue, String, GridFSUploadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(BsonValue, String, Publisher, GridFSUploadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openUploadStream(ClientSession, BsonValue, String)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(ClientSession, BsonValue, String, Publisher) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openUploadStream(ClientSession, BsonValue, String, GridFSUploadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(ClientSession, BsonValue, String, Publisher, GridFSUploadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openUploadStream(ClientSession, String)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(ClientSession, String, Publisher) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openUploadStream(ClientSession, String, GridFSUploadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(ClientSession, String, Publisher, GridFSUploadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openUploadStream(String)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(String, Publisher) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.openUploadStream(String, GridFSUploadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(String, Publisher, GridFSUploadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoCollection.replaceOne(Bson, TDocument, UpdateOptions)
    Prefer MongoCollection.replaceOne(Bson, Object, ReplaceOptions)
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.MongoCollection.replaceOne(ClientSession, Bson, TDocument, UpdateOptions)
    Prefer MongoCollection.replaceOne(ClientSession, Bson, Object, ReplaceOptions)
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.FindPublisher.snapshot(boolean)
    Deprecated in MongoDB 3.6 release and removed in MongoDB 4.0 release
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.uploadFromStream(BsonValue, String, AsyncInputStream)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(BsonValue, String, Publisher) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.uploadFromStream(BsonValue, String, AsyncInputStream, GridFSUploadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(BsonValue, String, Publisher, GridFSUploadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.uploadFromStream(ClientSession, BsonValue, String, AsyncInputStream)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(ClientSession, BsonValue, String, Publisher) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.uploadFromStream(ClientSession, BsonValue, String, AsyncInputStream, GridFSUploadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(ClientSession, BsonValue, String, Publisher, GridFSUploadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.uploadFromStream(ClientSession, String, AsyncInputStream)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(ClientSession, String, Publisher) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.uploadFromStream(ClientSession, String, AsyncInputStream, GridFSUploadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(ClientSession, String, Publisher, GridFSUploadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.uploadFromStream(String, AsyncInputStream)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(String, Publisher) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs.GridFSBucket.uploadFromStream(String, AsyncInputStream, GridFSUploadOptions)
    prefer GridFSBucket.uploadFromPublisher(String, Publisher, GridFSUploadOptions) instead
    com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.AggregatePublisher.useCursor(Boolean)
    There is no replacement for this. Applications can assume that the driver will use a cursor for server versions that support it (>= 2.6). The driver will ignore this as of MongoDB 3.6, which does not support inline results for the aggregate command.
